rukus.text: (Remember) when the Hypocrites and those who have disease in their hearts said: their religion deceived these. And anyone who trusts in God (should know that) God is the powerful and the wise
And if you could see when the angles take the life of those who disbelieved striking their faces and their backs (saying): taste the punishment of burning
that is for what your hands sent ahead, and indeed God is not wrong to His servants
Same as Pharaoh’s people and those before them, they disbelieved in God’s signs, so God took them (into punishment) for their sins. God is powerful, and severe in punishment
That is because God was not to change a favor that He granted a group until they change themselves. God hears all and knows all
Same as Pharaoh’s people and those before them, they denied the signs of their Master, so We destroyed them for their sins and We drowned Pharaoh’s people, for they were all wrongdoers
The worst creatures in God’s view are those who disbelieved and they do not believe
Those whom you contracted among them, then they break their promise every time, and they are not cautious (of God)
So if you defeat them in war, then frighten anyone behind them with them, so that they may take notice
And if you fear betrayal of any group, then throw back at them the same way (and break the treaty). Indeed God does not like the betrayers
